dom_changes.description: Page title changed from 'Login' to 'Sign In'.
Header text changed from 'Welcome' to 'Welcome Back!'.
Button text changed from 'Login' to 'Sign In'.
Button background color changed from #4285F4 to #0066FF.
Card padding increased and border-radius changed (8px â†’ 10px).
New 'Forgot password?' link added below password field.

test_impact_analysis: Any test using selector '#login-btn' will fail because the ID changed to '#signin-btn'.
Tests asserting page title 'Login' or header 'Welcome' will need to be updated to 'Sign In' and 'Welcome Back!'.
Username-based login tests must be updated to email-based login because the field semantics changed.
Visual regression tests will detect updated button style, card layout, and background gradient.
Accessibility tests may need to verify that the email input has correct type and label association.
new_tests_recommended: Add test to validate email format in the login input field.
Add test to verify the 'Forgot password?' link is visible and clickable.
Update existing login flow test to use '#signin-btn' instead of '#login-btn'.
Add visual regression test to cover rounded button and new card styling.
